channel.title: 脑机接口与智能机器人 on NWPU BBIC
channel.description: Recent content in 脑机接口与智能机器人 on NWPU BBIC

item.title: 会议ICRA发表论文：基于排列不变评价器的人工辅助重组多智能体强化学习
item.description: 论文“Human-Assisted Regrouping with Permutation Invariant Critic for Multi-Agent Reinforcement Learning”被机器人顶会ICRA接收

item.title: 期刊Journal of Automation and Intelligence 接收论文：机器人领域中的大语言模型技术：机遇、挑战和新视角
item.description: 论文“Large language models for robotics:Opportunities, challenges, and perspectives”被期刊Journal of Automation and Intelligence接收

item.title: 会议BIBM accept 论文：ST-GF：用于脑电图运动成像解码的基于图的时空特征融合网络
item.description: 论文“ST-GF:Graph-based Fusion of Spatial and Temporal Features for EEG Motor Imagery Decoding”被会议BIBM2024接收

item.title: 会议BIBM accept regular论文：一种基于平滑条件域对抗训练的脑电运动想象解码框架
item.description: 论文“A Smooth Conditional Domain Adversarial Training Framework for EEG Motor Imagery Decoding”被会议BIBM2024接受

item.title: 会议BIBM accept 论文：TF-HiTNet：一种用于脑电运动想象分类的时频分层Transformer网络
item.description: 论文“TF-HiTNet:A Temporal-Frequency Hierarchical Transformer Network for EEG Motor Imagery Classification”被会议BIBM2024接收

item.title: 顶会MICCAI early accept论文：DTCA：交叉注意力下的双Transformer的脑电和眼动数据融合
item.description: 论文“DTCA：“Dual-Branch Transformer with Cross-Attention for EEG and Eye Movement Data Fusion”被会议MICCAI2024 early accept

item.title: 会议ISBI接收论文：一种自适应脑电通道选择子图生成算法
item.description: 论文“A SELF-ADAPTIVE SUBGRAPH GENERATION ALGORITHM FOR EEG CHANNEL SELECTION”于会议IEEE International Symposium on Biomedical Imaging发表

item.title: 期刊TBME发表论文：一种用于大脑状态解码的多频段EEG Transformer
item.description: 论文“MEET: A Multi-Band EEG Transformer for Brain States Decoding”被期刊TBME接收

item.title: 会议ICCIP2023发表论文：基于扩散机制多目标蚁群算法的网络拓扑构建
item.description: 论文“A Diffusion-Based Multi-Objective Ant Colony Algorithm for Optimizing Network Topology Design”被会议2023 the 9th International Conference on Communication and Information Processing（ICCIP2023）接收

item.title: 期刊Applied Sciences发表论文：基于分片池的一维卷积神经与双向循环注意力单元网络的高效运动想象识别
item.description: 论文“Effective Human Motor Imagery Recognition via Segment Pool Based on One-Dimensional Convolutional Neural Network with Bidirectional Recurrent Attention Unit Network”被期刊Applied Sciences接收

item.title: 顶刊NN发表论文：区分大脑状态——基于多段信号随机重组与交互式双向RNN
item.description: 论文“Differentiating brain states via multi-clip random fragment strategy-based interactive bidirectional recurrent neural network”被顶刊Neural Networks接收
